旅游.sentence: 我打算这个假期去旅游。
旅游.sentencePinyin: Wǒ dǎsuàn zhège jiàqī qù lǚyóu.
旅游.sentenceTranslation: I plan to travel during this holiday.

服务员.sentencePinyin: Fúwùyuán bāng wǒ diǎn le cài.
服务员.sentenceTranslation: The waiter helped me order the dishes.

宾馆.sentencePinyin: Wǒ zài bīnguǎn zhùle sān tiān.
宾馆.sentenceTranslation: I stayed at the hotel for three days.

教室.sentenceTranslation: The students are studying in the classroom.

跑步.sentence: 我每天早上跑步锻炼身体。
跑步.sentencePinyin: Wǒ měitiān zǎoshang pǎobù duànliàn shēntǐ.
跑步.sentenceTranslation: I run every morning to exercise.

阴.note: often refers to阴阳 (yin-yang) or negative/hidden aspects
阴.sentenceTranslation: It's cool under the shade of the tree.

铅笔.sentencePinyin: Wǒ yòng qiānbǐ huà le yī fú huà.
铅笔.sentenceTranslation: I drew a picture with a pencil.

火车站.sentence: 我每天早上去火车站等朋友。
火车站.sentencePinyin: Wǒ měitiān zǎoshang qù huǒchēzhàn děng péngyǒu.
火车站.sentenceTranslation: I go to the train station every morning to wait for my friends.

西瓜.sentencePinyin: Wǒ xǐ huān chī xī guā.

羊肉.sentenceTranslation: I like to eat mutton hotpot.

公共汽车.sentence: 我每天坐公共汽车去学校。
公共汽车.sentencePinyin: Wǒ měitiān zuò gōnggòng qìchē qù xuéxiào.
公共汽车.sentenceTranslation: I take the bus to school every day.
